title: Did Erie County, Penn. Poll Worker Brag About Discarding Trump Ballots?
subtitle: Donald Trump Jr. and others seized upon social media posts that read, "I've thrown out over a hundred ballots for Trump already!"
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: On Election Day 2020, an Erie County, Pennsylvania, poll worker bragged about discarding more than 100 ballots in favor of U.S. President Donald Trump.
